Room.Name: Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a dimly lighted hallway upstairs in the Dragon Tooth Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The room on the east side of the hallway used to be the private quarters of the previous owner of this inn. When it was discovered that he was a leader in the anti-royalist terrorists, he was hanged in Dillsdale Memorial Park in a public ceremony and his property was confiscated by the crown. The Dragon Tooth Inn has been closed for a number of years now, and the present owner has not yet done anything with this part of the building.
